channel.title: Windows 7
channel.description:
Which download link for Windows 7 is the correct one? I've looked at a lot of them, but not sure which one would be the full one? I'm confuzzled
The one from the Windows website? If so, am I required to register?

item.title: Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:3, topic:290994”][quote author=Newty link=topic=384696.msg2885738#msg2885738 date=1248589403]
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/windows-7/get/download.aspx

You have to register, easy and free.

Also, if you have Vista, I HIGHLY suggest getting this. I love it.
[/quote]Oh, also I heard, that it shuts off your computer every 2 hours. Is that still happening?[/quote]

The Version they release is a “Release Candidate” where they let people try it and see if they like it. It starts turning off every 2 hours starting March, 2010. Then a few months later, it no longer starts. It is great to use though, and I have it on my 2 comps.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Krane:

I still prefer my Arch Linux

+1
Its Epic

ChaosPkers, It will shut your computer down every 2 hours after March 1, 2010 since the evaluation period ends on 1st June.

It will be available for purchase in September so you can get the full version then.
or [hidefromfbi] you can torrent it[/hidefromfbi]

Read full topic
